Foresee

This is a Java porting of the original ART C++ framework from the University of Cagliari.

This project is a modular machine learning framework, developed by the University of Cagliari.

The project aims at reusability and extensibility of the code, allowing third parties to add new functionalities, yet offering a selected set of builting functionalities of wide use.

Structure

`|- README.md
|- .gitignore
|- .idea/
|- it/unica/foresee/
|   |- datasets/
|   |- interpreters/
|   |- tests/
|   |- predictions/
|   |- Foresee.java
|
|- docs/
|- libs/
|- makefiles/
|- test-data/`

Requirements

  • Java JDK (Tested on Oracle Java 8)
  • Movielens dataset
